qa.name: Mr. Whiskers
qa.appearance: Well-worn plush toy with button eyes

json_to_edit.voice_over: When the lights go out, that's when my real life begins.
json_to_edit.description: A child's bedroom transforms into a magical playground for forgotten toys.
json_to_edit.name: Midnight Adventures
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Mr. Whiskers, a forgotten stuffed cat, leads a secret double life when his owner is asleep.

qa.action: Child's bedroom bathed in moonlight, toys scattered around.

hf.action: Mr. Whiskers' button eyes suddenly come to life.

tr.action: Mr. Whiskers carefully climbs down from the shelf.

xc.action: Other toys start to move and gather around Mr. Whiskers.

ka.action: Mr. Whiskers gestures excitedly, explaining the night's adventure.

fn.action: The toys follow Mr. Whiskers as he leads them out of the room.

af.action: The toys explore the moonlit living room, climbing furniture.

qo.action: Mr. Whiskers discovers a map hidden in a book.

fp.action: The toys huddle around Mr. Whiskers, examining the mysterious map.

va.action: As dawn approaches, the toys rush back to their original positions.

edit_command: Add a new shot after the 7th shot: a POV shot from Mr. Whiskers' perspective as he looks down from the top of a tall bookshelf, surveying the playground of the living room below.

updated_json.voice_over: When the lights go out, that's when my real life begins.
updated_json.description: A child's bedroom transforms into a magical playground for forgotten toys.
updated_json.name: Midnight Adventures

label.rationale:
we can fulfill this request by adding a new shot after the 7th shot in the scene. the 7th shot is currently "af", which shows the toys exploring the moonlit living room. our new pov shot will fit perfectly after this, showing mr. whiskers' perspective from the top of a bookshelf. we'll need to:

1. create a new shot with a unique two-letter key.
2. insert this new shot into the "list_display_order" after "af".
3. add the new shot details to the "shots" dictionary.
4. ensure the "number_of_shots" is updated to reflect the addition.

this addition will enhance the scene by providing a unique perspective and emphasizing mr. whiskers' leadership role in the adventure.

value.action: From Mr. Whiskers' perspective atop a tall bookshelf, we see the living room below transformed into a vast playground for toys.
